Archivlo

Application built in Angular, Django and Python during my time at Nashville Software School. The application helps researchers who work in archives find relevant materials, manage future, current, and past archival trips, and find others working in the same archives.

  • Client:
  • Date: February 2013
  • Category: Web Development
  • Link: www.archivlo.com

GHA Conference 2016

Poster for GHA Annual Conference. Theme was Center and Peripheries. Made in Photoshop.

  • Client: Graduate History Association
  • Date: March 2016
  • Category: Design
  • Link:

Digital History Workshop

Poster created for digital history workshop in February 2016. Used Ben Schmidt's iconic image of shipping logs from the 19th century, which is the most googled digital history image. Made in Photoshop.

  • Client: Vanderbilt History Seminar
  • Date: February 2016
  • Category: Design
  • Link:
